chapters.title: Chapter 41: An Unexpected AllyChapter 42: Stronger than Blood
chapters.info: King Yukobin the Undaunted, p. 642—Legendary Kandori king. His forces were pushed back as far as the Silverwall Keeps, a large fortification on the two sides of Firchon Pass. Getting through them requires traveling a considerable distance between large stone walls pocked with arrowslits. The Trollocs chasing him were turned back at the Silverwalls.
